Name: Jungle Defense
About the game: I came to the jungle to catch Igras. I want you to catch 10 Igrass. This game consists of four mini games. 1. a game of destroying bombs flying from cannons. 2. Game to Defeat Monster 3. A game of avoiding rolling stones. 4. A game of defeating a boss who attacks in various forms. You have the choice of seven weapons. Weapons can be shot like an FPS. Using various weapons, let's defeat the monster.
